lines.text: Well... maybe he didn't have a chance to.
If that hay caught fire so quickly, and Slick was standing next to it- or on top of it- maybe he couldn't react.
He would've been in the thick of the inferno before he could do anything.
...Doubt it. Hay burns quick, but not that quick.
He'd have had time to notice and move out of the way, for sure.
Well, how about the wires, then?
Maybe he got his coat snagged, or got his foot tied up, or something.
...I dunno. Sounds like a coincidence to me.
You sure there's not <c=#FF00FF>some more direct way</c> he coulda been stuck?
Man, come on! It's a plausible theory!
